Service Details: - Provides writers a wide variety of programs, services and resources to assist in developing their skills - Advocates for protection of rights and equitable treatment - Publishes an eZine for writers by writers - Helps members promote their work - Provides writers with up-to-date information on awards, contests, opportunities, calls for submissions, writing conferences and retreats - Provides learning opportunities for writers, including webinars, podcasts and CanWrite
